extendedInfo.description: Name:Blood Brothers Card ListDescription:Blood Brothers is a dark fantasy game, a tale of a hero turned vampire, who must bind an army in a pact of blood in order to exact vengeance on a corrupt empire. Choose one of eight heroes - knight, samurai, high elf, dark elf, ape, lizardman, dwarf, or goblin - to lead your army to victory.Data Source : http://www.patattack.comThis is the Blood Brothers Card List includes:Ainos ScaldhammerAinos Scaldhammer IIAlph, Desert Bounty HunterAlph, Desert Bounty Hunter IIApe BerserkerApe Berserker +Ape Berserker IIApe Berserker II +ArcheologistArcheologist
